# REST API Endpoint Specification Template (Intermediate)

Endpoint
- HTTP Method and Path

Purpose
- What this endpoint does and its role in the system

Context
- System integration points
- Authentication/authorization context

Request
- Method: GET|POST|PUT|DELETE|PATCH
- Path: /api/resource/{id}
- Headers: name — value/description
- Body (if applicable): JSON schema or fields with types/descriptions

Authentication
- Requirements and flows

Response Schemas
- Success (200/201): JSON structure
- Error responses: 400/401/404/500 — when and what

Behaviour
- Processing logic, validation, side effects

Edge Cases
- Case: Expected response
- Case: Expected response

Examples
- Complete request → Complete response
- Complete request → Complete response

Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Criterion
- [ ] Criterion

Performance Requirements
- Response time target, rate limits, versioning notes

Non-Functional Requirements
- Security, reliability, observability considerations
